TITLE: 71 Commands in 13 Minutes: Officers Gave Tyre Nichols Impossible Orders
SUMMARY: A Times analysis found that officers gave dozens of contradictory and unachievable orders to Mr. Nichols. The punishment was severe — and eventually fatal.

TITLE: Trudeau Accuses India in Killing of Canadian Sikh Leader
SUMMARY: The Canadian leader said agents of India had assassinated a Sikh community leader in British Columbia in June. India called the accusation “absurd.”

TITLE: Gary Indiana Doesn’t Travel in Any Circles
SUMMARY: The author of “Rent Boy” and “Do Everything in the Dark” reflects on a life of writing and art.

TITLE: ‘Visible Mending’: The Healing Powers of Knitting
SUMMARY: Crafters across Britain speak to how knitting can help us heal, even at our most broken.

TITLE: ‘Ghost Guns’: Firearm Kits Bought Online Fuel Epidemic of Violence
SUMMARY: They are untraceable, assembled from parts and can be ordered by gang members, felons and even children. They are increasingly the lethal weapon of easy access around the U.S., but especially California.

TITLE: What Happened to Val Kilmer? He’s Just Starting to Figure It Out.
SUMMARY: Cancer has taken his voice, but the unlikeliest movie star in Hollywood history still has a lot he wants to say.
